name: Panopticon (2bitchuck)
description:
The prisoners are staging an elaborate escape in the dark. You estimate that they will be gone in 30 seconds. Catch as many as you can before time runs out! left/right arrow to aim your all-seeing eye. The lights in the yard will briefly come on when you catch someone!

This game was made for TweetTweet Jam 6. The entire game source code is 548 characters long.
